text:
Richmond Terrace, south side, between Alaska Street and Tompkins Court, showing the Protestant Episcopal Church of the Ascension. Adjoining the church on the right is the Staten Island Cemetery; on the left is the parish house. The view is across a pond from the Staten Island Railroad freight yards.

April 1930

P. L. Sperr

(2) The same, at an earlier date.

June, 1926

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Alaska Street

title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Alaska Street

text:
1677 to 1691 (right to left), Richmond Terrace, north side, west of Alaska Street.

November 4, 1931

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Alaska Street

text:
1558 Richmond Terrace, at the S. E. corner of Alaska Street. In 1874 the house stood on property belonging to Mrs. Woodruff; from 1889 to 1907 it belonged to Thos. Kenny.

July 5, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Alaska Street

text:
1702 Richmond Terrace, south side, between Alaska Street and Taylor Street.

July 5, 1932

P. L. Sperr
